1.title: Playing with Power
1.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: playing with power, the image of esports, and the sweet lamentations of your enemies. Panelists: Tres Saranthus, Ken Chen, Rachel Quirico, Wade Penfold.

2.title: R.E.S.P.E.C.T.
2.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: esports in the Olympics, gaming as a career, and especially bad nicknames. Panelists: Christopher Mykles, Tres Saranthus, Ken Chen, Paola Alejandra.

3.title: Druids Gone Wild
3.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: fragging noobs, controversial game changes, and druids gone wild. Panelists: Tres Saranthus, Ken Chen, Rachel Quirico, Wade Penfold.

4.title: Hot Water
4.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: cyberbullies, women in esports, and red-headed stepchildren. Panelists: Paola Alejandra, Kyle Elam, D-Ron Maingrette, Emmalee Garrido.

5.title: Riding the Rage Wave
5.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: player jail, cheating and scandals, and riding the rage wave. Panelists: Bil Carter, Jason O'Toole, Mark Zimmerman, D-Ron Maingrette.

6.title: Turtling Up
6.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: profit hogs, disturbing trends, and the science of turtling up. Panelists: Stephanie Harvey, Justin Wong, Sherry Nhan, Aleksei Ichetovkin.

7.title: Vixen Overhaul
7.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: second chances, the business of esports, and a vixen overhaul. Panelists: Bil Carter, Jason O'Toole, Mark Zimmerman, Jared Jeffries.

8.title: Extreme Makeover: Counterstrike Edition
8.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: epic mash-ups, diversity and toxicity, and Extreme Makeover: Counterstrike Edition. Panelists: Paola Alejandra, William Cho, D-Ron Maingrette, Emmalee Garrido.

9.title: Schoolhouse Fragging
9.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: crushing disappointment, the year in review, and schoolhouse fragging. Panelists: Stephanie Harvey, Justin Wong, Sherry Nhan, Aleksei Ichetovkin.

10.title: Virtual Insanity
10.plot: Jessica Chobot and a panel of experts debate the burning questions in esports. This week's topics: sequel-itis, the future of esports, and virtual insanity. Panelists: Bil Carter, Jason O'Toole, Mark Zimmerman, Emmalee Garrido.

imdb.title: Player vs. Player
plot: Competitive debate series focused on the world of esports. Hosted by Jessica Chobot from Nerdist _News_ (qv) and featuring a new group of expert panelists every week.
